headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SHEPHERD, CAROL RUTH

snippet: SHEPHERD--Carol Ruth, 93, predeceased by H.R. Shepherd husband of 69 years and parents Judge Joseph G. and Helen Shapiro. Survived by John (Susan) and Jason, Marj (John) and Rebeca, Maddy, Beth (Ken) and Xandy, Ben (Liz) and Henry, Kate. She will be remembered as a wise, loving and wonderful mother. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SHEPHERD--Carol Ruth, 93, predeceased by H.R. Shepherd husband of 69 years and parents Judge Joseph G. and Helen Shapiro. Survived by John (Susan) and Jason, Marj (John) and Rebeca, Maddy, Beth (Ken) and Xandy, Ben (Liz) and Henry, Kate. She will be remembered as a wise, loving and wonderful mother. 1/3
